title: x/crypto/ssh: Support chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com authenticated encryption cipher
body:
It would be useful if the x/crypto/ssh package implemented @djmdjm 's chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com authenticated encryption cipher.

More info
- http://blog.djm.net.au/2013/11/chacha20-and-poly1305-in-openssh.html
- http://cvsweb.openbsd.org/cgi-bin/cvsweb/src/usr.bin/ssh/PROTOCOL.chacha20poly1305
